Clicked the Settings link to access project settings for modifying the project title.
```click("509")```

Filled the "Project name" field with "GIVE ME SPACE" to update the project title.
```fill("595", "GIVE ME SPACE")```

Clicked the "Save changes" button to save the updated project name.
```click("618")```

Clicked the enabled "Save changes" button to proceed with saving changes after the previous click timed out.
```click("835")```

Updated the project name to "GIVE ME SPACE" and confirmed the change was saved.
```send_msg_to_user("The project site's title has been successfully updated to 'GIVE ME SPACE'.")```
